tmtools:tm1:analyze.description: Analyze Territory Management (TM1) config in a connected org

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Directory to store TM1 analysis report

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm1:clean.description: Given the location of a TM1 Transformation report (tm1-transformation.json), removes stale TM1 config from the target org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-transformation.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm1:extract.description: Given the location of a TM1 Analysis file (tm1-analysis.json), extracts all TM1 config (data & metadata) from the associated org and saves it locally.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-analysis.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm1:transform.description: Transforms locally stored TM1 data and metadata into bundles that can be deployed back into the source org once Enterprise Territory Management (TM2) is activated.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-extraction.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm2:deploy.description: Given the location of a TM1 Transformation report (tm1-transformation.json), deploys TM2 metadata to the target org.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-transformation.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm2:deploysharing.description: Given the location of a TM2 Deployment report (tm2-deployment.json), deploys TM2 sharing rules into the target org. Requires the migrated Territor Model to be in the 'Active' state.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-deployment.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed

tmtools:tm2:load.description: Given the location of a TM2 Deployment report (tm2-deployment.json), loads TM2 data into the target org using the Bulk API.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

sourcedir.name: sourcedir
sourcedir.description: Directory that contains a tm1-deployment.json file. Defaults to . (current directory) if not specified.

falcondebug.name: falcondebug
falcondebug.description: List of debug namespaces which should render output

falcondebugerror.name: falcondebugerror
falcondebugerror.description: Display extended information for uncaught Errors

falcondebugsuccess.name: falcondebugsuccess
falcondebugsuccess.description: Display extended information upon successful command completion

falcondebugdepth.name: falcondebugdepth
falcondebugdepth.description: Sets the depth of object inspection when debug output is displayed
